verses.text: \w Put|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ram’s \w horn|strong="H7782"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w lips|strong="H2441"\w*! \w An|strong="H3068"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* looms \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* people \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w cries|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Me|strong="H3045"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3045"\w* God, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w You|strong="H3045"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H2186"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w rejected|strong="H2186"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; \w an|strong="H3478"\w* enemy \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w him|strong="H7291"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w set|strong="H6213"\w* \w up|strong="H6213"\w* \w kings|strong="H4427"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H2091"\w* \w Me|strong="H4480"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w princes|strong="H8323"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w My|strong="H3045"\w* approval. \w With|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w*, \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* own destruction.

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* has \w rejected|strong="H2186"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w*,\f + \fr 8:5 \ft Or calf idol; see 1 Kings 12:29.\f* \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*. \w My|strong="H3808"\w* anger \w burns|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w them|strong="H5704"\w*. \w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w incapable|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w innocence|strong="H5356"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*— \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w craftsman|strong="H2796"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w broken|strong="H7616"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7616"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H7307"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w*. \w There|strong="H1097"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w standing|strong="H7054"\w* \w grain|strong="H7054"\w*; \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w sprouts|strong="H6780"\w* fails \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w yield|strong="H6213"\w* \w flour|strong="H7058"\w*. \w Even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w produce|strong="H6213"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H2114"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w*.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w*! \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* worthless \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* Assyria \w like|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* \w donkey|strong="H6501"\w* \w on|strong="H5927"\w* \w its|strong="H5927"\w* own. Ephraim \f + \fr 8:9 \ft That is, the northern kingdom of Israel; also in verse 11\f* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w hired|strong="H8566"\w* lovers.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w hire|strong="H8566"\w* allies among \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w round|strong="H1471"\w* \w them|strong="H2490"\w* \w up|strong="H6908"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H2490"\w* \w diminish|strong="H4592"\w* under \w the|strong="H3588"\w* oppression \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* Ephraim \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w sinning|strong="H2398"\w*.

Though \w I|strong="H3644"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w for|strong="H2803"\w* \w them|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H3789"\w* great \w things|strong="H3644"\w* \w of|strong="H8451"\w* \w My|strong="H2803"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w they|strong="H3644"\w* \w regarded|strong="H2803"\w* \w them|strong="H3789"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* something \w strange|strong="H2114"\w*.

Though \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w gifts|strong="H2077"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* though \w they|strong="H1992"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*: \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w palaces|strong="H1964"\w*; \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* \w fortified|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*. \w But|strong="H7911"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* fire \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* consume \w their|strong="H7971"\w* citadels.
